Game.Overview:
Journey through ancient temples and ruins with Ayumi, an alluring treasure-hunter determined to unlock the secrets of a powerful orb and acquire untold riches. However, every treasure has its price - Ayumi has been struck by a mysterious curse upon finding her greatly desired artifact. Can you help Ayumi free herself from the curse?
In this Thrilling anime-style action-fest, you will encounter fierce battles as you help Ayumi confront her ultimate fate - whatever it may be.
